data.text: The food was great I have the staff is very friendly I like the food very well thanks to Ahmed and John whoâ€™s taking care of us definitely I will come and stay again in this hotel, and room is very spacious definitely I will come back for staying again
data.title: I love the place

data.text: The restaurant was very nice and the food was good. The omelette was very tasty as it was made right in front of you. The staff were very friendly and were willing to help.One improvement which can be made is making the restaurant bigger. Overall the dining experience especially the breakfast was fantastic
data.title: Restaurant review

data.text:
My experience at Roda Amwaj Suites was extremely disappointing. The staff, particularly Angelo, was incredibly rude and unprofessional. Not only was the service subpar, but the attempt to charge an extra 200 dirhams per person for excess was completely unjustified and unacceptable.

I expected better treatment and transparency from a reputable establishment like Roda Amwaj Suites. The behavior of the staff, especially Angelo, tarnished my entire stay and left a bitter impression. I strongly advise against staying at this hotel due to the poor service and unwarranted charges imposed on guests.
data.title: Worst customer service

data.text: The worst customer service experience. The party started late as the celebrant came late from RAk, at 12am the reception called and told that the allowed pax was 6. Informed us to leave or pay 200 each, but not all will be staying to sleep just to spend a little time to celebrate. They way the guy handle the situation is very poor and unprofessional. We understand the policy atleast there a little consideration from that 1 guy who talked to all of us.
data.title: Bad Exp. Reception on duty

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear 933danem,
We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused due to our failure to meet your expectations during your recent stay with us. Our team always strives to provide exceptional service and hospitality to all our guests.

We made every effort to assist you at every step and ensure that you were comfortable during your stay. We would like to highlight that the room category you booked had a specific package that could accommodate a certain number of guests. Additionally, we clearly communicated that any additional guests would incur extra charges, as per our visitor policy.

Despite our best efforts and polite requests, it appears there was a misunderstanding regarding the policy. We regret any confusion this may have caused.

Once again, we sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused and hope that this incident does not overshadow your overall experience with us. We look forward to the opportunity to welcome you back and provide you with the excellent service that we are known for.
Best Regards,
Rabii Mehdi
General Manager
owner_response.author: Rabii Mehdi

data.text:
First time staying here and I must say with the service and attitude of staff it's unbearable.
Came all the way here from RAK to celebrate my mom's birthday with the family and I must say. THIS IS NOT A PLACE FOR FAMILY TO STAY !!! The way that Eslam expresses his service to us and the rest of the staff is heartbreaking.And with my family as witnessed of the way he deals the issue is not very hospitable and we felt unwelcomed. We have been staying here in UAE for long years but never have we experienced this kind of service in attitude and visitor restricting policy. After continuously trying to explain to him the situation  he wouldn't even listen. All we asked is to give us some consideration in letting my visitor stays for couple of hours since it is a gathering from my family members accross UAE and they won't be staying over. AGAIN HIGHLIGHT ON NOT STAYING EVER, He brought the policy that indicated  additional guest must be charged for spending a night of 200 which we clearly say that they will not stay and they will only visit for couple of 2-3hrs And after all this discussion the rest of the staff are just nonchalant and didn't care about us. From the checked in up to this point it's all disappointing. 
I have nothing more to say but BIG NO. It felt as if having a big family is not allowed is not welcomed. 

I didn't care for the upgrade when they failed to do the set up I requested after having it confirmed all I ask them is to let my visitor spend some quality time with us since it's the sole reason I booked. 

I would suggest to all the travelers who is having a gathering, celebration or a big family to not stay here because the service and the way they deal things here are not very hospitable. Rooms are nice but it's the service that wants you to come back which they obviously don't have.  

Worst stay ever.
data.title: Worst stay ever in UAE

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Arox,
We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused due to our failure to meet your expectations during your recent stay with us. Our team always strives to provide exceptional service and hospitality to all our guests.

We made every effort to assist you at every step and ensure that you were comfortable during your stay. We would like to highlight that the room category you booked had a specific package that could accommodate a certain number of guests. Additionally, we clearly communicated that any additional guests would incur extra charges, as per our visitor policy.Regarding your booking, the room category and package details clearly outlined the maximum occupancy allowed. Any additional guests beyond this limit were communicated as chargeable, along with a detailed explanation of our visitor policy. Despite our best efforts and polite reminders, it appears there was a misunderstanding in adhering to these policies.

We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused you and assure you that we are continuously striving to improve our services.We value your feedback and look forward to the opportunity to better serve you in the future.
Best Regards,
Rabii Mehdi
General Manager
owner_response.author: Rabii Mehdi
